name: ONET Snacks Classic Puzzle
description:
Onet Classic Snacks is simple yet addicting pair solving puzzle game free or matching game with a fresh gameplay for all ages. If you like connect / matching game or tan, paopao, then you will love to play Onet Fruits free.
-------------------------------------------------------------
2 Game difficulties mode: normal and hardest
More challenging level
Save and Resume Game
-------------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY ONET?
The main objective of this game is to remove all icon tiles.
Tap the icon tiles to select it.
Remove 2 fruits with the same kind which can be connected within 3 lines.
-------------------------------------------------------------
